Converters module

class Converters.RenameUnpickler(file, *, fix_imports=True, encoding='ASCII', errors='strict')

Bases: Unpickler

See https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2121874/python-pickling-after-changing-a-modules-directory

find_class(module, name)

Return an object from a specified module.

If necessary, the module will be imported. Subclasses may override this method (e.g. to restrict unpickling of arbitrary classes and functions).

This method is called whenever a class or a function object is needed. Both arguments passed are str objects.

Converters.convertFromPy27_Array(Array: ndarray) → ndarray

Convert a numpy array of strings in byte-form to numpy array of strings in string-form

Parameters

Array (Any) – An array of byte strings (e.g., b’Setup’)

Returns

decoded_array

Return type

Any

Converters.convertFromPy27_Dict(Dict: dict) → dict

Convert a dictionary pickled in Python 2.7 to a Python 3 dictionary

Parameters

Dict (dict) – Dictionary to be converted

Returns

Converted Dictionary

Return type

dict
